name: zotero-mcp
description: Local, containerized MCP server for the Zotero API.

tools.name: zotero_search_items
tools.summary: Search and list items in the personal Zotero library.

tools.name: zotero_get_item
tools.summary: Fetch metadata for a single item in the personal Zotero library.

tools.name: zotero_create_item
tools.summary: Create a new item in the personal Zotero library.

tools.name: zotero_upload_attachment
tools.summary: Upload a PDF attachment and link it to an existing item.

env.name: ZOTERO_API_KEY
env.description: Zotero API key for personal library access.

env.name: ZOTERO_USER_ID
env.description: Zotero user ID associated with the API key.

env.name: ZOTERO_MCP_DEBUG
env.description: Set to 1 to include a startup log event.

env.name: ZOTERO_MCP_LOG_LEVEL
env.description: Log level for JSON logs (default INFO).

env.name: ZOTERO_READ_CACHE
env.description: Set to 1 to enable in-memory GET caching (default off).
